events.description: Come meet up for a run along the Potomac and enjoy the Cherry Blossoms in bloom.
events.name: West Potomac Park Run

events.description: Join us for a brisk walk along the Meadowlink Trail and enjoy the splendor of Rock Creek.
events.name: Meadowlink Trail in Rock Creek Park

events.description: Enjoy the sights and sounds of the sea wharf.
events.name: Anacostia Riverwalk

events.description: Discover the wonder that inspired Benjamin Banneker to help design the cardinal points of Washington, DC.  Learn about the self-taught astromer.
events.name: Benjamin Banneker Park
